players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We must vote her out to protect the town."
Diana: "I agree with Bob's claim. We should vote for Alice to protect the town."
Diana: "I still support voting for Alice. Bob's investigation seems credible, and her silence is suspicious."
Bob: "I stand by my investigation; Alice is the mafioso. Her silence is telling, and we should all vote her out to save the town."
